LanguageData.EGO_Helmet_Mask.label: EGO Mask
LanguageData.EGO_Helmet_Mask.description: Specially gestated amalgam Mask, well protects the owner. Designed for use by Undyings. Amalgams are hybrids of EGO seed and Obsidia technology.\n\nThe item's quality levels can be reset using an EGO Seed.
LanguageData.EGO_Helmet_Helm.label: EGO Helm
LanguageData.EGO_Helmet_Helm.description: Specially gestated amalgam Helm, perfectly protects the owner. Designed for use by Undyings. Amalgams are hybrids of EGO seed and Obsidia technology.\n\nThe item's quality levels can be reset using an EGO Seed.
LanguageData.EGO_Helmet_Exohelm_Worker.label: EGO Exohelm(Constructor)
LanguageData.EGO_Helmet_Exohelm_Worker.description:
Specially gestated amalgam Exohelm, excellent protects the owner. Designed for use by Undyings. Amalgams are hybrids of EGO seed and Obsidia technology.

This modification improve working stats.

The item's quality levels can be reset using an EGO Seed.
LanguageData.EGO_Helmet_Exohelm_Melee.label: EGO Exohelm(Berserker)
LanguageData.EGO_Helmet_Exohelm_Melee.description:
Specially gestated amalgam Exohelm, excellent protects the owner. Designed for use by Undyings. Amalgams are hybrids of EGO seed and Obsidia technology.

This modification improve melee combat stats.

The item's quality levels can be reset using an EGO Seed.
LanguageData.EGO_Helmet_Exohelm_Ranged.label: EGO Exohelm(Ballista)
LanguageData.EGO_Helmet_Exohelm_Ranged.description:
Specially gestated amalgam Exohelm, excellent protects the owner. Designed for use by Undyings. Amalgams are hybrids of EGO seed and Obsidia technology.

This modification improve ranged combat stats.

The item's quality levels can be reset using an EGO Seed.
LanguageData.EGO_Helmet_Exohelm_Psy.label: EGO Exohelm(Mindweaver)
LanguageData.EGO_Helmet_Exohelm_Psy.description:
Specially gestated amalgam Exohelm, excellent protects the owner. Designed for use by Undyings. Amalgams are hybrids of EGO seed and Obsidia technology.

This modification improve psy stats.

The item's quality levels can be reset using an EGO Seed.
LanguageData.EGO_Helmet_Exohelm_Mechanitor.label: EGO Exohelm(Automancer)
LanguageData.EGO_Helmet_Exohelm_Mechanitor.descriptio:
Specially gestated amalgam Exohelm, excellent protects the owner. Designed for use by Undyings. Amalgams are hybrids of EGO seed and Obsidia technology.

This modification improve mechanitor stats.

The item's quality levels can be reset using an EGO Seed.
LanguageData.EGO_Armor_Suit.label: EGO Suit
LanguageData.EGO_Armor_Suit.description: Specially gestated amalgam Suit, well protects the owner. Designed for use by Undyings. Amalgams are hybrids of EGO seed and Obsidia technology.\n\nThe item's quality levels can be reset using an EGO Seed.
LanguageData.EGO_Armor_Carapace.label: EGO Carapace
LanguageData.EGO_Armor_Carapace.description: Specially gestated amalgam Carapace, perfectly protects the owner. Designed for use by Undyings. Amalgams are hybrids of EGO seed and Obsidia technology.\n\nThe item's quality levels can be reset using an EGO Seed.
LanguageData.EGO_Armor_Shell_Worker.label: EGO Shell(Constructor)
LanguageData.EGO_Armor_Shell_Worker.description:
Specially gestated amalgam Shell, excellent protects the owner. Designed for use by Undyings. Amalgams are hybrids of EGO seed and Obsidia technology.

This modification improve working stats.

The item's quality levels can be reset using an EGO Seed.
LanguageData.EGO_Armor_Shell_Melee.label: EGO Shell(Berserker)
LanguageData.EGO_Armor_Shell_Melee.description:
Specially gestated amalgam Shell, excellent protects the owner. Designed for use by Undyings. Amalgams are hybrids of EGO seed and Obsidia technology.

This modification improve melee combat stats and modified with the addition of a Smokepop pack.

The item's quality levels can be reset using an EGO Seed.
LanguageData.EGO_Armor_Shell_Ranged.label: EGO Shell(Ballista)
LanguageData.EGO_Armor_Shell_Ranged.description:
Specially gestated amalgam Shell, excellent protects the owner. Designed for use by Undyings. Amalgams are hybrids of EGO seed and Obsidia technology.

This modification improve ranged combat stats and modified by installing a Grenade Launcher.

The item's quality levels can be reset using an EGO Seed.
LanguageData.EGO_Grenade.label: EGO Ballista Grenade
LanguageData.EGO_Armor_Shell_Psy.label: EGO Shell(Mindweaver)
LanguageData.EGO_Armor_Shell_Psy.description:
Specially gestated amalgam Shell, excellent protects the owner. Designed for use by Undyings. Amalgams are hybrids of EGO seed and Obsidia technology.

This modification improve psy stats and modified with the addition of a Jump pack.

The item's quality levels can be reset using an EGO Seed.
LanguageData.EGO_Armor_Shell_Mechanitor.label: EGO Shell(Automancer)
LanguageData.EGO_Armor_Shell_Mechanitor.description:
Specially gestated amalgam Shell, excellent protects the owner. Designed for use by Undyings. Amalgams are hybrids of EGO seed and Obsidia technology.

This modification improve mechanitor stats and modified with the pack that allows the user to deploy a battery-powered turret.

The item's quality levels can be reset using an EGO Seed.
LanguageData.Grenade_Armor_EGO_TurretPack.label: EGO turret pack capsule
